column1: Little Goat Diner////On another ocassion I was able to try the shrimp and cheese grits and the chicken and waffles. Both were really good
column2: with flavors that were unexpected in a very good way. I have also been to Little Goat for lunch
column3: I had braised beef sandwich and my friend had the ruben. My braised beef sandwhich was decent
column4: nothing to write home about and unfortuntely my freind did not like the ruben
column6: the meat looked dry to me.
